artist: Artist: Eduardo Chillida; Author: André Frénaud; Publisher: Maeght Éditeur, Paris
description: white cardboard box with gray speckles containing embossed white folder; 16 pages inside with raised, abstract printed images and text; pages are separate, and folded in half; lender's archive #111
image_copyright: © Eduardo Chillida and Andre Frenaud %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
markings:
Watermark: Arches
Watermark on cover (appears in folded upper corners): Richard de Bas[?]
medium: Etching and aquatints, embossing; letterpress; with blind-embossed wrapper
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: André Frenaud │Chillida [with his monogram beneath]
title: Le Chemin des devins, suivi de Ménerbes (The Way of the Soothsayers, after Ménerbes)
